title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
description: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

items.content_html:
Ibexa DXP is using random execution time to hinder timing attacks against user accounts, a method of discovering whether a given account exists in a system without knowing its password, thus affecting privacy. This implementation was found to not be good enough in some situations. The fix replaces this with constant time functionality, configured in the new security.yml parameter 'ibexa.security.authentication.constant_auth_time'. It will log a warning if the constant time is exceeded. If this happens the setting should be increased.

References

  • https://github.com/ibexa/core/security/advisories/GHSA-2x4v-g8cx-jxrq
  • https://developers.ibexa.co/security-advisories/ibexa-sa-2022-006-vulnerabilities-in-page-builder-login-and-commerce
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2x4v-g8cx-jxrq
items.title: [ibexa/core] Login timing attack in ibexa/core

items.content_html:
imgurl v2.31 was discovered to contain a Blind SQL injection vulnerability via /upload/localhost.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-29305
  • https://github.com/helloxz/imgurl/issues/75
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rrjv-34p5-4c7r
items.title: [helloxz/imgurl] SQL injection in helloxz/imgurl

items.content_html:
A flaw was found in moodle where ID numbers displayed when bulk allocating markers to assignments required additional sanitizing to prevent a stored XSS risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-30596
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2083583
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=434578
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-74204
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/6abe964bbac41b5e40a81b40962f7044b0dc201e
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-wvh5-78h5-gmgr
items.title: [moodle/moodle] Cross-site Scripting in moodle

items.content_html:
A flaw was found in moodle where an SQL injection risk was identified in Badges code relating to configuring criteria.

References

items.content_html:
A flaw was found in moodle where the description user field was not hidden when being set as a hidden user field.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-30597

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-x6gm-qqwp-76gr

items.content_html:
A flaw was found in moodle where global search results could include author information on some activities where a user may not otherwise have access to it.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-30598
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2083592
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=434580
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-71623
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/4f2eac208d8af4a833f81364e39a5579f39642b1
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-fj6p-g234-rrv3
items.title: [moodle/moodle] Exposure of Sensitive Information in moodle
